verses.verse: For as much <S%G1895><s%> as many <S%G4183><s%> have taken <S%G2021><s%> in hand <S%G2021><s%> to set <S%G392><s%> forth <S%G392><s%> in order <S%G1299><s%> a declaration <S%G1335><s%> of those <S%G3588><s%> things <S%G4229><s%> which are most surely <S%G4135><s%> believed <S%G4135><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> us,

Even <S%G2531><s%> as they delivered <S%G3860><s%> them to us, which <S%G3588><s%> from the beginning <S%G746><s%> were eyewitnesses, <S%G845><s%> and ministers <S%G5257><s%> of the word; <S%G3056><s%>

It seemed <S%G1380><s%> good to me also, <S%G2504><s%> having had perfect <S%G199><s%> understanding <S%G3877><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> things from the very first, <S%G509><s%> to write <S%G1125><s%> to you in order, <S%G2517><s%> most <S%G2903><s%> excellent <S%G2903><s%> Theophilus, <S%G2321><s%>
That you might know <S%G1921><s%> the certainty <S%G803><s%> of those things, <S%G3056><s%> wherein <S%G4012><s%> <S%G3739><s%> you have been instructed. <S%G2727><s%>

THERE was in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Herod, <S%G2264><s%> the king <S%G935><s%> of Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> priest <S%G2409><s%> named <S%G3686><s%> Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> of the course <S%G2183><s%> of Abia: <S%G7><s%> and his wife <S%G1135><s%> was of the daughters <S%G2364><s%> of Aaron, <S%G2><s%> and her name <S%G3686><s%> was Elisabeth. <S%G1665><s%>

And they were both <S%G297><s%> righteous <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> walking <S%G4198><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> and ordinances <S%G1345><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> blameless. <S%G273><s%>

And they had <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> child, <S%G5043><s%> because <S%G2530><s%> that Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> was barren, <S%G4723><s%> and they both <S%G297><s%> were now well <S%G4260><s%> stricken <S%G4260><s%> in years. <S%G2250><s%>

And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that while <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> he executed <S%G2407><s%> the priest's <S%G2407><s%> office <S%G2407><s%> before <S%G1725><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in the order <S%G5010><s%> of his course, <S%G2183><s%>

According <S%G2596><s%> to the custom <S%G1485><s%> of the priest's <S%G2405><s%> office, <S%G2405><s%> his lot <S%G2975><s%> was to burn <S%G2370><s%> incense <S%G2370><s%> when he went <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
And the whole <S%G3956><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the people <S%G2992><s%> were praying <S%G4336><s%> without <S%G1854><s%> at the time <S%G5610><s%> of incense. <S%G2368><s%>

And there appeared <S%G3700><s%> to him an angel <S%G32><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> side <S%G1188><s%> of the altar <S%G2379><s%> of incense. <S%G2368><s%>
And when Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> him, he was troubled, <S%G5015><s%> and fear <S%G5401><s%> fell <S%G1968><s%> on him.

But the angel <S%G32><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Fear <S%G5399><s%> not, Zacharias: <S%G2197><s%> for your prayer <S%G1162><s%> is heard; <S%G1522><s%> and your wife <S%G1135><s%> Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> shall bear <S%G1080><s%> you a son, <S%G5207><s%> and you shall call <S%G2564><s%> his name <S%G3686><s%> John. <S%G2491><s%>
And you shall have <S%G2071><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> and gladness; <S%G20><s%> and many <S%G4183><s%> shall rejoice <S%G5463><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> his birth. <S%G1083><s%>

For he shall be great <S%G3173><s%> in the sight <S%G1799><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and shall drink <S%G4095><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> wine <S%G3631><s%> nor <S%G2532><s%> strong <S%G4608><s%> drink; <S%G4608><s%> and he shall be filled <S%G4130><s%> with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost, <S%G4151><s%> even <S%G2089><s%> from his mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb. <S%G2836><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> of the children <S%G5207><s%> of Israel <S%G2474><s%> shall he turn <S%G1994><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%> their God. <S%G2316><s%>

And he shall go <S%G4281><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> him in the spirit <S%G4151><s%> and power <S%G1411><s%> of Elias, <S%G2243><s%> to turn <S%G1994><s%> the hearts <S%G2588><s%> of the fathers <S%G3962><s%> to the children, <S%G5043><s%> and the disobedient <S%G545><s%> to the wisdom <S%G5428><s%> of the just; <S%G1342><s%> to make <S%G2090><s%> ready <S%G2090><s%> a people <S%G2992><s%> prepared <S%G2680><s%> for the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> you shall be dumb, <S%G4623><s%> and not able <S%G1410><s%> to speak, <S%G2980><s%> until <S%G891><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> that these <S%G5023><s%> things shall be performed, <S%G1096><s%> because <S%G473><s%> <S%G3759><s%> you believe <S%G4100><s%> not my words, <S%G3056><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> shall be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in their season. <S%G2540><s%>
And the people <S%G2992><s%> waited <S%G4328><s%> for Zacharias, <S%G2197><s%> and marveled <S%G2296><s%> that he tarried <S%G5549><s%> so long in the temple. <S%G3485><s%>

And when he came <S%G1831><s%> out, he could <S%G1410><s%> not speak <S%G2980><s%> to them: and they perceived <S%G1921><s%> that he had seen <S%G3708><s%> a vision <S%G3701><s%> in the temple: <S%G3485><s%> for he beckoned <S%G1269><s%> to them, and remained <S%G1265><s%> speechless. <S%G2974><s%>
And it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that, as soon as the days <S%G2250><s%> of his ministration <S%G3009><s%> were accomplished, <S%G4130><s%> he departed <S%G565><s%> to his own house. <S%G3624><s%>

And after <S%G3326><s%> those <S%G5025><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> his wife <S%G1135><s%> Elisabeth <S%G1665><s%> conceived, <S%G4815><s%> and hid <S%G4032><s%> herself <S%G1438><s%> five <S%G4002><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Thus <S%G3779><s%> has the Lord <S%G2962><s%> dealt <S%G4160><s%> with me in the days <S%G2250><s%> wherein <S%G3739><s%> he looked <S%G1896><s%> on <S%G1896><s%> me, to take <S%G851><s%> away <S%G851><s%> my reproach <S%G3681><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> men. <S%G444><s%>

And the angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1525><s%> in to her, and said, <S%G2036><s%> Hail, <S%G5463><s%> you that are highly favored, <S%G5487><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is with you: blessed <S%G2127><s%> are you among <S%G1722><s%> women. <S%G1135><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> to the angel, <S%G32><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> shall this <S%G5124><s%> be, seeing <S%G1893><s%> I know <S%G1097><s%> not a man? <S%G435><s%>

And what <S%G4159><s%> is this <S%G5124><s%> to me, that the mother <S%G3384><s%> of my Lord <S%G2962><s%> should come <S%G2064><s%> to me?

And his mercy <S%G1656><s%> is on them that fear <S%G5399><s%> him from generation <S%G1074><s%> to generation. <S%G1074><s%>

As he spoke <S%G2980><s%> to our fathers, <S%G3962><s%> to Abraham, <S%G11><s%> and to his seed <S%G4690><s%> for ever. <S%G165><s%>

And his mouth <S%G4750><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> immediately, <S%G3916><s%> and his tongue <S%G1100><s%> loosed, and he spoke, <S%G2980><s%> and praised <S%G2127><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
